languages.text: "Время так скоротечно в объятьях желанн{mf|ого|ой}. Кажется, Великий даровал нам вечность счастья".
"Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."
languages.original_text: "Время так скоротечно в объятьях желанн{mf|ого|ой}. Кажется, Великий даровал нам вечность счастья".

traits.locale_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."
"Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."
"Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."
"Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

languages.text: “在爱人的怀抱里，时间过得可真快。看来，至高无上的神皇已经赐予了我们永恒的幸福。”
languages.original_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

traits.locale_text: “在爱人的怀抱里，时间过得可真快。看来，至高无上的神皇已经赐予了我们永恒的幸福。”

languages.text: 「愛する人の腕に包まれていると、時間はあっという間に過ぎる。エグザルテッド・ワンが永遠の幸福として授けてくださったみたいに」
languages.original_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

traits.locale_text: 「愛する人の腕に包まれていると、時間はあっという間に過ぎる。エグザルテッド・ワンが永遠の幸福として授けてくださったみたいに」

languages.text: «El tiempo vuela en brazos de la persona amada. Se ve que el Exaltado quiere regalarnos una eternidad de felicidad».
languages.original_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

traits.locale_text: «El tiempo vuela en brazos de la persona amada. Se ve que el Exaltado quiere regalarnos una eternidad de felicidad».

languages.text: « Le temps passe si vite entre les bras de l'être aimé... Il semblerait que l'Exalté nous ait offert un bonheur éternel. »
languages.original_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

traits.locale_text: « Le temps passe si vite entre les bras de l'être aimé... Il semblerait que l'Exalté nous ait offert un bonheur éternel. »

languages.text: "In den Armen {mf|des Geliebten|der Geliebten} vergeht die Zeit so schnell. Als hätte uns der Erhabene ewiges Glück geschenkt."
languages.original_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

traits.locale_text: "In den Armen {mf|des Geliebten|der Geliebten} vergeht die Zeit so schnell. Als hätte uns der Erhabene ewiges Glück geschenkt."

languages.text: "Sevdiceğinin kollarındayken zaman su gibi akıp geçiyor. Görkemli bize sonsuz bir mutluluk armağan etmiş gibi."
languages.original_text: "Time goes so quickly in the arms of your beloved. It seems the Exalted One has gifted us an eternity of happiness."

traits.locale_text: "Sevdiceğinin kollarındayken zaman su gibi akıp geçiyor. Görkemli bize sonsuz bir mutluluk armağan etmiş gibi."
